data.title: Alexander Gordon (journalist)
data.meta_description: Alexander Garrievich Gordon is a Russian radio and television presenter, journalist, actor and director. He has worked on "NTV" channel and "Channel One". As of January 2023, Gordon is the host of First Channel's Dok-Tok.
data.text:
